A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The last jedi really does a good job in devolping the character of Kylo Ren and lives up to the standards that force awakens set.I did however not like what they did with the character luke skywalker however other than that they really also did well in devolping Rey and even adding a great twist on her backstory.
